list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Enhance JKSView with UI improvements and functionality updates
Added a final `DefaultListModel` for certificate alias management and `Map` for X509 certificates. Modified UI elements for improved user interaction, including updated panel borders and more efficient toolbar layout. Introduced a file chooser dialog for importing certificates, along with robust logging for tracking selected file details.

task.summary: Default task

Rename packages for SSL Toolbox rebranding
Refactor all package names from "com.jmpeax.keytoolj" to "com.jmpeax.ssltoolbox". This change aligns with the rebranding effort from Keytoolj to SSL Toolbox, altering references in Java files and project configurations.

Add initial project templates and documentation
Introduced essential project documentation and configuration files. This includes ISSUE_TEMPLATE for bugs and features, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING guide, LICENSE, and README. Additionally, added PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE to standardize contributions.

Add initial project templates and documentation
Introduced essential project documentation and configuration files, including ISSUE_TEMPLATE, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING guide, LICENSE, and README. This update also includes a PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE to standardize contributions.

Add Hugo site deployment workflow
Introduced a GitHub Actions workflow for building and deploying a Hugo site to GitHub Pages. Also added configuration files including the default archetype and Hugo settings for the site. Adjusted IntelliJ IDEA workspace settings for the newly integrated changes.

Implement Hugo site with GitHub Actions deployment
Added Hugo configuration files and GitHub Actions workflow for site deployment to GitHub Pages. Reorganized files including default archetypes and go modules. Updated .gitignore to exclude generated files.

Add PEM file type support
Introduced PEMFileType class to handle PEM files and updated the plugin.xml to recognize various PEM-related file extensions. This addition improves file management and editing capabilities within the project.

Add PEM file type support
Introduced PEMFileType class to handle PEM files, enhancing file management and editing capabilities. Updated the plugin.xml for PEM-related file extensions and modified the plugin icon for better representation. Changes also include minor workspace adjustments and corrected geospatial references.
Adjusted GitHub Actions workflow to trigger changes in the 'docs' directory.

Adjust GitHub Actions workflow and rebrand project to SSL Toolbox.
Updated the GitHub Actions workflow to include 'docs' directory changes. Rebranded the project from Keytoolj to SSL Toolbox, involving updates to build.gradle.kts, settings.gradle.kts, and plugin.xml.

Rename editor type ID and update workspace configurations
Changed the editor type ID to "pem-file-editor" for clarity. Simplified workspace configuration comments and adjusted paths, reflecting recent project rebranding efforts and workflow updates.

Bump version to 0.1.2-alpha
Update the project version from 0.1.1-alpha to 0.1.2-alpha in build.gradle.kts. This change is necessary to reflect recent improvements and fixes.

Add JKS file support and streamline package structure
Introduced support for JKS files, including editor and view implementations. Refactored existing packages for clearer structure, updating PEM references accordingly. Removed unnecessary quotes in properties files to ensure text consistency.

Add CI workflows and update Gradle build script
Introduce GitHub Actions workflows for testing on merge and publishing on alpha tags. Update `build.gradle.kts` to support dynamic plugin channels. Changes also include adjustments to project configuration in `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Add environment variables and UI panel final modifiers
This commit updates the deployment workflow to use new environment variables for signing the plugin. It also refactors UI code in `JKSView.java` to make some panel fields final and removes redundant labels. The changes streamline the signing process and enhance code clarity.

Add environment variables and UI panel final modifiers
This commit updates the deployment workflow to use new environment variables for signing the plugin. It also refactors UI code in `JKSView.java` to make some panel fields final and removes redundant labels. The changes streamline the signing process and enhance code clarity.

Simplify deploy-alpha workflow
Combine build, test, and publish steps into a single action, removing redundant code and improving efficiency. This change ensures all necessary tasks are completed in one run, streamlining the deployment process to the alpha channel.

Update deploy-alpha workflow for tag-based triggers
Removed the branch-based trigger to deploy only on tagged commits and cleaned up an unused environment variable. This ensures deployments to the alpha environment are streamlined and less error-prone.

Add GitHub Actions workflows for stable and beta deployments
Introduces deploy-stable.yml for stable releases triggered by tags starting with 'v*' and deploy-beta.yml for beta releases triggered by tags ending in '-beta'. Both workflows set up JDK 17, cache Gradle packages, and run build, test, and publish steps. This ensures efficient CI/CD for different release channels.

Add support for JKS file management and plugin UI updates
Introduced functionality for handling Java Keystore (JKS) files directly within the plugin, including a new file chooser and import alias dialog. Updated plugin.xml to reflect new version and release notes. Adjusted toolbar icons for better visual alignment.

Enhance JKSView with UI improvements and functionality updates
Added a final `DefaultListModel` for certificate alias management and `Map` for X509 certificates. Modified UI elements for improved user interaction, including updated panel borders and more efficient toolbar layout. Introduced a file chooser dialog for importing certificates, along with robust logging for tracking selected file details.

MESSAGE.value: View Basic Certificates and Chain

Remove unused KeyToolWindow and KeystoreToolWindow classes
These classes were no longer in use and have been deleted. Additionally, refactored MyCustomFileEditor to PEMFileEditor for better clarity and functionality. Enhanced CertificateHelper to support multiple certificates and added PemView for detailed certificate display.

Rename packages for SSL Toolbox rebranding
Refactor all package names from "com.jmpeax.keytoolj" to "com.jmpeax.ssltoolbox". This change aligns with the rebranding effort from Keytoolj to SSL Toolbox, altering references in Java files and project configurations.

Add initial project templates and documentation
Introduced essential project documentation and configuration files. This includes ISSUE_TEMPLATE for bugs and features, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING guide, LICENSE, and README. Additionally, added PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE to standardize contributions.

Add initial project templates and documentation
Introduced essential project documentation and configuration files, including ISSUE_TEMPLATE, CODE_OF_CONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING guide, LICENSE, and README. This update also includes a PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE to standardize contributions.

Add Hugo site deployment workflow
Introduced a GitHub Actions workflow for building and deploying a Hugo site to GitHub Pages. Also added configuration files including the default archetype and Hugo settings for the site. Adjusted IntelliJ IDEA workspace settings for the newly integrated changes.

Implement Hugo site with GitHub Actions deployment
Added Hugo configuration files and GitHub Actions workflow for site deployment to GitHub Pages. Reorganized files including default archetypes and go modules. Updated .gitignore to exclude generated files.

Add PEM file type support
Introduced PEMFileType class to handle PEM files and updated the plugin.xml to recognize various PEM-related file extensions. This addition improves file management and editing capabilities within the project.

Add PEM file type support
Introduced PEMFileType class to handle PEM files, enhancing file management and editing capabilities. Updated the plugin.xml for PEM-related file extensions and modified the plugin icon for better representation. Changes also include minor workspace adjustments and corrected geospatial references.
Adjusted GitHub Actions workflow to trigger changes in the 'docs' directory.

Adjust GitHub Actions workflow and rebrand project to SSL Toolbox.
Updated the GitHub Actions workflow to include 'docs' directory changes. Rebranded the project from Keytoolj to SSL Toolbox, involving updates to build.gradle.kts, settings.gradle.kts, and plugin.xml.

Rename editor type ID and update workspace configurations
Changed the editor type ID to "pem-file-editor" for clarity. Simplified workspace configuration comments and adjusted paths, reflecting recent project rebranding efforts and workflow updates.

Bump version to 0.1.2-alpha
Update the project version from 0.1.1-alpha to 0.1.2-alpha in build.gradle.kts. This change is necessary to reflect recent improvements and fixes.

Add JKS file support and streamline package structure
Introduced support for JKS files, including editor and view implementations. Refactored existing packages for clearer structure, updating PEM references accordingly. Removed unnecessary quotes in properties files to ensure text consistency.

Add CI workflows and update Gradle build script
Introduce GitHub Actions workflows for testing on merge and publishing on alpha tags. Update `build.gradle.kts` to support dynamic plugin channels. Changes also include adjustments to project configuration in `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Add environment variables and UI panel final modifiers
This commit updates the deployment workflow to use new environment variables for signing the plugin. It also refactors UI code in `JKSView.java` to make some panel fields final and removes redundant labels. The changes streamline the signing process and enhance code clarity.

Update deploy workflow to run tests during publish
Consolidate the test and publish steps to ensure tests are run before publishing the plugin. This change removes redundant steps and streamlines the deployment process.

Simplify deploy-alpha workflow
Combine build, test, and publish steps into a single action, removing redundant code and improving efficiency. This change ensures all necessary tasks are completed in one run, streamlining the deployment process to the alpha channel.

Update deploy-alpha workflow for tag-based triggers
Removed the branch-based trigger to deploy only on tagged commits and cleaned up an unused environment variable. This ensures deployments to the alpha environment are streamlined and less error-prone.

Add GitHub Actions workflows for stable and beta deployments
Introduces deploy-stable.yml for stable releases triggered by tags starting with 'v*' and deploy-beta.yml for beta releases triggered by tags ending in '-beta'. Both workflows set up JDK 17, cache Gradle packages, and run build, test, and publish steps. This ensures efficient CI/CD for different release channels.

Change icons and add file chooser dialog.
Updated the toolbar button icons for better consistency. Added a file chooser dialog to allow users to select files and enter passwords. Additionally, integrated a logger to capture selected file details.

Add support for JKS file management and plugin UI updates
Introduced functionality for handling Java Keystore (JKS) files directly within the plugin, including a new file chooser and import alias dialog. Updated plugin.xml to reflect new version and release notes. Adjusted toolbar icons for better visual alignment.

Enhance JKSView with UI improvements and functionality updates
Added a final `DefaultListModel` for certificate alias management and `Map` for X509 certificates. Modified UI elements for improved user interaction, including updated panel borders and more efficient toolbar layout. Introduced a file chooser dialog for importing certificates, along with robust logging for tracking selected file details.

option.value:
